sen.j: 峰山県（みねやまけん）は廃藩置県により1871年（明治4年）に設置された県。
sen.e: Mineyama Prefecture was established in 1871 through Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures).
Mineyama Prefecture was established in 1871 through Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures).
Mineyama Prefecture was established in 1871 through Haihan-chiken (abolition of feudal domains and establishment of prefectures).

sen.j: 同年10月に豊岡県に統合され消滅した。
sen.e: It was merged into Toyoka Prefecture and disappeared.
It was merged into Toyoka Prefecture and disappeared.
It was merged into Toyooka Prefecture and disappeared.

sen.j: 県域は現在の京丹後市の一部に設置されていた。
sen.e: Mineyama Prefectural area was put in the part of present Kyotango City.
The Mineyama Prefectural area was established in the area of present day Kyotango City.
The Mineyama Prefectural area was established in the area of present day Kyotango City.
History
History
History

sen.j: 1871年（明治4年）7月14日：廃藩置県により峰山藩（1.1万石）が峰山県として発足。
sen.e: On July 14, 1871 : Mineyama Domain was inaugurated as Mineyama Prefecture through Haihan-chiken.
On July 14, 1871: Mineyama Domain was inaugurated as Mineyama Prefecture through Haihan-chiken.
July 14, 1871: Mineyama Domain was inaugurated as Mineyama Prefecture through Haihan-chiken.

sen.j: 1871年（明治4年）11月22日：豊岡県に統合
sen.e: On November 22, 1871 : It was merged into Toyoka Prefecture.
On November 22, 1871: It was merged into Toyoka Prefecture.
November 22, 1871: It was merged into Toyooka Prefecture.

sen.j: 1876年（明治9年）8月22日：豊岡県廃止により京都府へ編入。
sen.e: On August 22, 1876: It was absorbed into Kyoto Prefecture with the abolition of Toyoka Prefecture.
On August 22, 1876: It was absorbed into Kyoto Prefecture with the abolition of Toyoka Prefecture.
August 22, 1876: It was absorbed into Kyoto Prefecture with the abolition of Toyooka Prefecture.
